title: Erie Canalway National Heritage Corridor: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do          Start your adventure here!  You'll find engineering marvels, historic vessels and canal sites, and lively Main Streets, along with great recreational opportunities and hundreds of festivals and events. More than 500 miles of navigable waterway and 234 distinctive communities stretching across the full expanse of upstate New York are here to explore.  Visit our official website for complete details.
